title: Appendicolith classification: physical and chemical properties of appendicoliths in patients with CT diagnosed acute appendicitis–a prospective cohort study
details: S Vanhatalo, E Mäkilä, AJ Hakanen, E Munukka… - BMJ Open Gastroenterology, 2024
abstract: Objective Appendicoliths are associated with a more complicated course of acute appendicitis and failure of non-operative treatment. We aimed to update the appendicolith classification originally described in 1966 and to assess the …
